alert.note: Alert for Knox; Lewis; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 3:10AM CST until January 02 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 11 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches, sleet accumulations around one quarter of an inch, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Knox MO, Lewis MO and Shelby MO Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 1 AM to 11 AM CST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 AM this morning to Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.
